resources.string: Welcome to the Accessible Memory Game \nThis game is targeted for users with vision impairment.\nTalkback feature is not required but is recommended for the full game experience.

Welcome to the Accessible Memory Game. Game explanation: First: After you start the game, you will have %d seconds to explore the revealed cards. After this time, an announcement will be given and the focus will be placed in the card row 1 column 1. Second: Closed cards will be announced by their position. Third: Double tap to reveal a card. Fourth: Cards already matched will be announced as matched and the position. Fifth: Hope you love the game Ana, Vitor and Andre.
